attributes.action: Allow the private growing of cannabis and increase sentencing for dealing it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A public licence be granted for a grow area of 4 foot by 6 foot Ideal for single person usage open to inspection.
Increase sentencing for the sale of cannabis as this supplys organised crime. By home growing a person is freeing them selves from organised crime.The goverment should grant this freedom.
